General.Name: ZheJiang BangJie Digital Knitting Share Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Bangjie Holding Group Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, weaving, and marketing of seamless garments in China and internationally. The company offers clothes; sports and outdoor wear, such as beach wear, sportswear, outdoor travel wear, etc.; casual wear products, including family wear, pajamas, etc.; fashion products comprising youth wear, urban wear, etc.; and others. It also provides financial loans; property leasing services; and photovoltaic equipment and components, new energy prime mover equipment, electronic components, and batteries, as well as operates and manages hospitals. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Bangjie Digital Knitting Share Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Yiwu, China.
